attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
hundreds of soviet icebreakers rotting radioactivity
probably quite a few submarine reactors kicking around in scotland?
and no one can find a spare one to re-commision the royal yacht brttania and STILL  keep the old engines for show? 
i suppose its like all our rural post offices,  so just in my nearest village i know it will destroy the community for the older people with no transport (of course us with transport long ago lost the ability to buy road tax there, the very idea there might be multi-bank ATM machines in them to help pay is obviously disgraçeful disrespect to tadition ,  besides being contry folk a four by four into the nearst city makes more sense to get a tenner)

so when you send round the guys with chain saws to cut the pole for post boxes (yellow fed-ex box will look nice) might as well be done with it and hack brttiania to bits and put the lot on eBay

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
